hanzi-su-wiki:
農

Значения

Земледелие

Мнемоника

Вверху — голова и руки согнувшегося человека. Работать внаклонку, омогая земле разродиться от бремени 辰.

Варианты

农

heisig_chinese_memo: The most unlikely persons in the world to take up agriculture must be Bender and Bruce Lee. An awkwared moment as they stare on the various farming utensils, hoe, plow. Both with straw hats on and blue overalls, and drawn in Groenigs irrevent style.
heisig_constituent: agriculture, bend, sign of the dragon, cliff, two, hairpin, safety-pin
koohiiStory1: Imagine if you could bend a dragon to your will. Helpful in war, yes, but also a boon for agriculture. The dragon could use its sharp claws to plough the ground, and use its firey breath to clear the land. But first you'd have to bend the dragon to your will -- not an easy task.
koohiiStory2: It's a good agricultural sign when, as the farmer is bending down, he discovers some plants arranged in the sign of the dragon. It means the weather and earth will be supportive of the crops.
jp_example_words:
農耕(のうこう): farming, agriculture
農場(のうじょう): farm (agriculture)
農村(のうそん): agricultural community, farm village, rural
農地(のうち): agricultural land
酪農(らくのう): dairy (farm)
農家(のうか): farmer, farm family
農業(のうぎょう): agriculture
農産物(のうさんぶつ): agricultural produce
農民(のうみん): farmers, peasants
農薬(のうやく): agricultural chemicals
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You blast your music loud so it causes a landslide, revealing the perfect soil for farming! Musically moved dirt is perfect for agriculture.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine slowly turning up your big boombox until your ears hurt and the ground beneath your feet is vibrating with the beat. Soon you and the boombox are sliding with all of the earth down the hill and onto your farmland. Hooray, now the farming can begin!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The first person to come up with this farming method was Nostradamus (のう), the famous seer and prophecy man. He predicted humans of the future would use special "yell cubes" to "move that good earth."
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture Nostradamus flailing his arms and trying to explain his vision to the farmers at the time. He knows that if they listen their farming techniques will improve, but they're looking at him like he's nuts.
Ru_Notes: Фонетик для: 濃 (こい、ノウ густой).
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), ｜, 厂 (скала), 日 (день), 衣 (одежда), 辰 (знак Дракона)
Ru_trainchinese: nóng: (графема) земледелие, сельское хозяйство; земледелец, крестьянин
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the dragon's (辰) melody (曲) helps agriculture
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: People who work in agriculture have a top hat for sun protection and a scarf to wipe the sweat away.
humanum_full_description_en:
oracle bone inscriptions are from the " forest " from " e " from " and " Bronze plus or from " field ", " e " is the ancient weeding tools, agricultural weeding the original meaning intended use of tools TANAKA , The extension is farming. See " Chen ". A Bronze or eliminating shaped like a hand " and ." To the small seal becomes the " 𦥑 " from the elephant's hands. Guo Moruo and Yang Shuda believed that " Chen " was the first article of " mirage ", like a mirage clam. The ancients put a handle under the shell stone and used it as a farm tool. "Huainanzi. "Pan Theory": "The ancients ploughed and ploughed, rubbed the mirage and drew it." Gao Luu's note: "The mirage, the big clam, the Mo Lingli, use the scorpion. The scorpion, remove the filth.

Qiu Xigui pointed out that agriculture " farmers " and expressed weeding " hoe " is a word differentiation, before farming, weed trees need to be cleared in order to reclaim land into farmland, to do farming. He also believes that " chen " is an agricultural tool like " jin " and "钁", not a " mirage ." See " humiliation ".

Oracle said to open up wasteland and weeding, "B" 8502: "Ling (Nong) Qian Fang". Also used as a place name. The inscriptions in gold mean farming and make the tripod: "Wang Daqian farmer in Tiantian", which means that the king of Zhou held the ceremony of Dajiatian in Putian. Also used as a name. It also refers to crops, agricultural crops, and wall plates: "Nongshou".

The bamboo slips of the Warring States period represent farming. "Three Virtues" Jane 15: "Looking down on the land, and respecting the farmers.

" Nong " Xiaozhu as " Wang ", "Shuowen": "Worship, farming. From the voice. 𨑋, Yuwen from the forest. 𦦥, ancient prose. Agriculture, also ancient prose.
humanum_short_description_en: oracle bone inscriptions are from the " forest " from " e " from " and " Bronze plus or from " field ", " e " is the ancient weeding tools, agricultural weeding the original meaning intended use of tools TANAKA , The extension is farming.
humanum_full_description:
甲骨金文皆從「林」從「辰」從「又」，金文或加從「田」，「辰」是上古除草的農具，農的本義是用農具清除田中的雜草之意，引伸為耕作。參見「辰」。甲金文或省去象手形的「又」。至小篆變為從象雙手的「𦥑」。郭沫若、楊樹達認為「辰」是「蜃」的初文，象蜃蛤，古人於貝殼石片之下，附上提手，作為農具。《淮南子．氾論》：「古者剡耜而耕，摩蜃而耨。」高誘注：「蜃，大蛤，摩令利，用之耨。耨，除田穢也。」

　　裘錫圭指出農業的「農」和表示除草的「耨」是一字分化，農耕之前，需要清除雜草林木，才能開墾土地，闢為農田，以事耕作。他又認為「辰」是象「斤」、「钁」一類農具，而非「蜃」。參見「辱」。

　　甲骨文表示開荒除草，《乙》8502：「蓐(農)芀方」。又用為地名。金文表示耕作，令鼎：「王大耤農于諆田」，表示周王在諆田舉行大藉田之禮。又用作人名。又指稼穡、農作物，牆盤：「農穡」。

　　戰國竹簡表示農耕，《上博竹書五．三德》簡15：「俯視地利，敄(務)農敬戒」。

　　「農」小篆作「䢉」，《說文》：「䢉，耕也。从䢅囟聲。𨑋，籒文䢉从林。𦦥，古文䢉。辳，亦古文䢉。」
humanum_short_description: 甲骨金文皆從「林」從「辰」從「又」，金文或加從「田」，「辰」是上古除草的農具，農的本義是用農具清除田中的雜草之意，引伸為耕作。

甲骨金文皆從「 林 」從「 辰 」從「 又 」，金文或加從「 田 」，「 辰 」是上古除草的農具，農的本義是用農具清除田中的雜草之意，引伸為耕作。參見「 辰 」。甲金文或省去象手形的「 又 」。至小篆變為從象雙手的「 𦥑 」。郭沫若、楊樹達認為「 辰 」是「 蜃 」的初文，象蜃蛤，古人於貝殼石片之下，附上提手，作為農具。《淮南子．氾論》：「古者剡耜而耕，摩蜃而耨。」高誘注：「蜃，大蛤，摩令利，用之耨。耨，除田穢也。」 裘錫圭指出農業的「 農 」和表示除草的「 耨 」是一字分化，農耕之前，需要清除雜草林木，才能開墾土地，闢為農田，以事耕作。他又認為「 辰 」是象「 斤 」、「 钁 」一類農具，而非「 蜃 」。參見「 辱 」。 甲骨文表示開荒除草，《乙》8502：「蓐(農)芀方」。又用為地名。金文表示耕作，令鼎：「王大耤農于諆田」，表示周王在諆田舉行大藉田之禮。又用作人名。又指稼穡、農作物，牆盤：「農穡」。 戰國竹簡表示農耕，《上博竹書五．三德》簡15：「俯視地利，敄(務)農敬戒」。 「 農 」小篆作「 䢉 」，《說文》：「䢉，耕也。从䢅囟聲。𨑋，籒文䢉从林。𦦥，古文䢉。辳，亦古文䢉。」

農字的基本解释

農
nóng
见“农”。

農字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nóng］
［《廣韻》奴冬切，平冬，泥。］
“农1”的繁体字。“莀2”的今字。“辳1”的今字。
(1)耕种。
(2)谓屯垦。
(3)农夫，农民。
(4)农事；农业。
(5)农神。古代蜡祭八神名之一。
(6)农家的简称。九流之一。
(7)厚。
(8)勤勉。
(9)古代的农官。
(10)指神农氏。

農字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辰字部】　農； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1252第24
〔古文〕䢉?辳?????莀【唐韻】【集韻】?奴冬切，音儂。【說文】耕也，種也。【書·洪範】農用八政。【註】農者，所以厚生也。【周禮·天官·大宰】以九職任萬民。一曰三農生九穀。【註】三農：山農、澤農、平地農也。【左傳·襄九年】其庶人力于農穡。【註】種曰農，斂曰穡。　又神農，古炎帝號。【前漢·食貨志】闢土植穀曰農。炎帝敎民植穀，故號神農氏，謂神其農業也。又萬山氏有子曰農，能植百穀，後世因名耕甿爲農。　又司農，官名。【前漢·百官志】秦曰治粟內史，漢景帝更名大司農。　又弘農，郡名。【前漢·地理志註】武帝元鼎四年置。　又姓也。【風俗通】神農氏後。　又叶奴當切，音囊。【潘岳·籍田頌】思樂甸畿，薄采其芳。大君戾止，言籍其農。　又叶奴刀切，音猱。【束皙·勸農賦】惟百里之置吏，各區別而異曹。考治民之踐職，美莫富乎歡農。

農字的源字形

字源演变：

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
農字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Chen Zi Department] 　 Nong; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 1252 24
〔Ancient Chinese〕 Waiter? Nong????? Xun [Tang Yun] [Jiyun] Nudong cut, sound Nong. [Said Wen] Farming is also planting. 【Book·Hong Fan】Eight policies for agricultural use. [Note] Farmers, so the welfare is also. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Da Zai】Manmin with nine positions. One is the three farms and nine valleys. [Note] Sannong: Shannong, Zenong, and flat land farmers. [Zuo Zhuan·Xiang Nine Years] His general manpower was in Nonghu. [Note] Planting means farming, and converging means 穑.　Shennong again, the ancient Yandi. 【Pre-Han·Food and Goods History】Putting soil and planting valleys called farmers. Emperor Yan ordered the people to plant valleys, hence the name Shennong, which is also called Shenqi agriculture. Name meaning

nóng
вм. 农
Radicals: 曲, 辰  (music, landslide)
Meaning Mnemonic
You blast your music loud so it causes a landslide, revealing the perfect soil for farming! Musically moved dirt is perfect for agriculture.
Imagine slowly turning up your big boombox until your ears hurt and the ground beneath your feet is vibrating with the beat. Soon you and the boombox are sliding with all of the earth down the hill and onto your farmland. Hooray, now the farming can begin!
Reading Mnemonic
The first person to come up with this farming method was Nostradamus (のう), the famous seer and prophecy man. He predicted humans of the future would use special "yell cubes" to "move that good earth."
Picture Nostradamus flailing his arms and trying to explain his vision to the farmers at the time. He knows that if they listen their farming techniques will improve, but they're looking at him like he's nuts.
